name: Public Marketing Communications
description:
Public is a marketing communications agency that deliver marketing communications to improve and grow your business, delivering return on investment or to put it another way; They help its client's business to make more noise in a busy marketplace.

They specialize in the design and build of websites, managing social media accounts, developing and broadcasting email campaigns, writing copy, graphic design and branding, and delivering training on all aspects of web design and digital marketing.
